headline: Nvidia Stock Drops. What Amazon’s New Chips Mean for the AI Leader.
summary: Nvidia  stock was falling Wednesday, pushed down by the threat of competition from  Amazon.com  new AI hardware.  Nvidia’s competition is Amazon’s new Trainium 3 AI chips, which the e-commerce company launched for customers on Tuesday.  Although Amazon said its chips can reduce the cost of training and operating AI models by up to 50% compared with systems that use equivalent graphics processing units, which are Nvidia’s specialty, the two companies still appear on relatively friendly terms.

raw.headline: Nvidia Stock Drops. What Amazon’s New Chips Mean for the AI Leader.
raw.summary: Nvidia  stock was falling Wednesday, pushed down by the threat of competition from  Amazon.com  new AI hardware.  Nvidia’s competition is Amazon’s new Trainium 3 AI chips, which the e-commerce company launched for customers on Tuesday.  Although Amazon said its chips can reduce the cost of training and operating AI models by up to 50% compared with systems that use equivalent graphics processing units, which are Nvidia’s specialty, the two companies still appear on relatively friendly terms.

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Broadcom After Its 125% AI Fueled Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether Broadcom is still worth considering after its huge run up, or if the easy money has already been made, this article will walk through what the current price really implies. The stock has been choppy in the short term, slipping about 4.0% over the last week but still up 5.2% in the past month and an eye catching 64.5% year to date, with an even bigger 125.9% gain over the last year and 925.8% over five years. Those moves have been fueled by Broadcom's central role...

headline: Marvell shares soar as chipmaker boosts its AI drive with Celestial deal
summary: Marvell Technology jumped 9.3% to a nine-month high on Wednesday after its $3.25 billion deal to acquire semiconductor startup Celestial ​AI bolstered investor confidence in the chipmaker's push into next-gen AI ‌infrastructure. The company is doubling down on AI infrastructure to regain momentum after a tough year ‌marked by intense competition in its custom AI chips and networking. Its shares are down about 16% so far this year, through Tuesday's close.

Its shares are down about 16% so far this year, through Tuesday's close.
